text:
Created attachment 31247
Maximum data value from sample is not reflected by Graph Results listener

Maximum data sample's value is not reflected by Graph Results listener (see screenshot attached).

After test was run, received 40 data readings by HTTP Request sampler.
However, on Graph Results listener the maximum value reported is not the maximum value from received 40 data readings.
The value displayed on the top left of graph is the max of 90th percentile of response time.
